mainBoard.name: Soltari Champion
mainBoard.originalText:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
If Soltari Champion attacks, all other creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

rulings.text: If an attacking creature has multiple evasion abilities, such as shadow and flying, a creature can block it only if that creature satisfies all of the appropriate evasion abilities.
Multiple instances of shadow on the same creature are redundant.
Once a creature has been blocked, that creature remains blocked and will deal and be dealt combat damage even if it gains or loses shadow or if the blocking creature gains or loses shadow.

mainBoard.name: Smite
mainBoard.originalText: Destroy target blocked creature.

rulings.text: A “blocked creature” is an attacking creature that has been blocked by a creature this combat, or has become blocked as the result of a spell or ability this combat. Unless the attacking creature leaves combat, it continues to be a blocked creature through the end of combat step, even if the creature or creatures that blocked it are no longer on the battlefield or have otherwise left combat by then.

mainBoard.text: Destroy target blocked creature.

foreignData.name: Abhärtung
foreignData.text: Verhindere bis zu X Schadenspunkte bei einer Kreatur Deiner Wahl. Lege für jeden Schadenspunkt, der auf diese Art verhindert wurde, eine +1/+1 Marke auf diese Kreatur.

mainBoard.name: Temper
mainBoard.originalText: Prevent up to X damage to target creature. For each 1 damage prevented in this way, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.

rulings.text: The +1/+1 counters do show up at the same time as any unprevented damage, which means they are there before you check for lethal damage.
You can make X be larger than the amount of damage, but you only get one counter for each actual point of damage prevented.

mainBoard.text: Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. For each 1 damage prevented this way, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.

mainBoard.flavorText: For a sharp second, Selenia froze, and Crovax's blade found home. As the angel shattered like glass, Crovax felt his mind collapse—the curse had been fulfilled.
